quest.name: Onward to Sharlayan
journal: Y'shtola wishes to tell you more about her former master, Matoya.

According to Y'shtola, Matoya has been living as a hermit on the fringes of Sharlayan, in the Dravanian hinterlands. The journey will take you west through the Dravanian forelands. In order to prepare, Alphinaud suggests that you first return to Ishgard. Make your way back to the Holy See, and rejoin your comrades at the aetheryte plaza.
It is decided that you and Alphinaud will accompany Y'shtola on the expedition to Sharlayan. The first leg of your journey will take you to the settlement of Tailfeather.
You have arrived in Tailfeather. The Dravanian hinterlands are now but a short distance away.
objectives: Speak with Alphinaud at the aetheryte plaza in Ishgard.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: In my youth, I had the honor of studying under Matoya. In the field of aetheric research, she was without rival.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: I have no doubt that her knowledge will be of aid to our cause. The question is, will she share it with us? My master has ever been willfulâ”€the gods forbid anyone disagrees with her.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: When the Garlean Empire first marched upon Eorzea some fifteen years ago, the denizens of Sharlayan were summoned back to the motherland.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: However, Matoya refused to join the exodus. To this day, she lives a hermit's life on the fringes of the abandoned city.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: So it is to the Dravanian hinterlands that we must go. To the place of my birth...

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Though Alisaie and I were born in Sharlayan, our days there were short. We remained only until the exodus, and I have not returned since.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Oh, so it's to be a homecoming, then? As fine a reason as any to go to Sharlayan, and it would afford us the opportunity to pay my master a visit.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Ahem. I believe you have mistaken our primary objective, Y'shtola. At any rate, the journey will take us through largely unknown territory. Let us first return to Ishgard and make our preparations.

dialogue.name: TATARU
dialogue.text: Tee hee! Y'shtola looks absolutely smashing in her new outfit, don't you think?

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Matoya... The name rings strangely familiar.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Sharlayan is situated in the Dravanian hinterlands.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: To get there, we must strike west and traverse the breadth of the Dravanian forelands. Make no mistake, it will be a grueling journey.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: The party shall be comprised of Forename, Y'shtola, and myself. Tataru, pray remain in Ishgard and continue the search for our missing friends.

dialogue.name: TATARU
dialogue.text: Yes, sir!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: First, let us make for Tailfeather.

dialogue.name: TATARU
dialogue.text: We managed to find Y'shtola. Given time, I'm sure we'll be reunited with the others as well!

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: So this is the Holy See. I should like to linger awhile and take in the sights, but it must wait till after our mission.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: A long soak in the Lifestream followed by a long journey... I would not recommend it to anyone.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: But rest assured my strength is returning to me. I shall be back to my former self ere long.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: When last we set foot here, Estinien and Ysayle were with us. Though it was not all that long ago, I find myself strangely taken by nostalgia.
